explanations.neural network: The paper compares the proposed hierarchical Bayesian network model with the back-propagation artificial neural network, indicating relevance to neural networks.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper mentions the back-propagation artificial neural network as a comparison method, which involves backpropagation.
explanations.BP: BP is an abbreviation for backpropagation, which is mentioned in the paper as part of the back-propagation artificial neural network.
